D_Argue.Dialogue: Officer! The clerk doesn't want to take my coupon!
M'am, I already told you, this coupon is invalid. I can't accept it.
That's ridicolous, it's valid! I do have rights! You can't refuse to take it!
Officer, may you please take a look at it and clarify?

D_Expired.Dialogue: * Coupon for 30 $ at 24/7 market, expires on 06/01/2024 *

D_Manipulated.Dialogue: * You can see the 24/7 market coupon for 30$ is manipulated to 60 $ *
This coupon has been manipulated. Look, the numbers were changed.

D_RefuseLeave.Dialogue: This can't be real! You're lying!
Officer, that's racist! I won't go before I receive my right!

D_Run.Dialogue: Everybody is against me! Forget it, I won't pay this!

D_Fight.Dialogue: I have enough of your bullshit!
And you Officer, are part of the problem!!! Aaaaaargh!

D_Eco_Argue.Dialogue: This is outrageous! Look at this packaging! Plastic everywhere! Are you trying to kill the planet?
Ma'am, I understand your concern, but we don't manufacture the products. We just sell them.
Just sell them? So you're complicit! Selling non-eco-friendly products is basically illegal!
Ma'am, that's not true. There are no laws against this packaging—
Don't lie to me! I'll have this store shut down for engaging in illegal activities! You're part of the problem! You're a—you're a murderer!
Excuse me? Alright Officer, please remove her from the store and M'am, you're banned from this store from now on.

D_Eco_RefuseLeave.Dialogue: I will not leave this store until this criminal is arrested!
Ma'am, I understand you're upset, but this is not a criminal matter. You need to leave the store, or I'll have to remove you myself.
I refuse! If you don't arrest this murderer, then YOU'RE complicit too! I'll stay here all day if I have to!

D_Eco_FleeWPackage.Dialogue: You know what? If you won't fix it, I'll do it myself! This ends now!
I'm saving the planet! This belongs in proper disposal, not on your filthy shelves!
Ma'am, that's theft. Put the item down and step away.
It's not theft if I'm saving humanity! Arrest THEM for stocking this garbage!
Ma'am, this is your last warning. Drop the item and cooperate, or you'll be placed under arrest.

D_Eco_Argumentative.Dialogue: Officer! You need to arrest this man immediately! He's a murderer! Selling all this plastic — he's practically choking the Earth himself!
Ma'am, this isn't a criminal matter. Now, if you—
Don't even start with me! Where's your supervisor? I want their name. And YOU— * pointing at the officer * —I want your name and badge number! RIGHT NOW!
Ma'am, we're not doing this. Either leave the store, or I'll have to escort you out.
Oh, I'd love to see you try! I'm going to report ALL of you! Corporate, the mayor, the media—everyone will hear about this!

D_Eco_Taser.Dialogue: Oh, so now you're threatening me? I feel so unsafe right now! This is assault!
Ma'am, no one is threatening you. Please calm—
ASSAULT! YOU ASSAULTED ME! Everyone saw it!
Ma'am, no one has touched you. Let's just—
Don't you talk to me, murderer!
